snippet.title: Sonic: Heroes Origins - SAGE '23 Demo (8bit gameplay reveal trailer)
snippet.description:
WiP Demo available now, new builds every day during SAGE '23! https://sonicfangameshq.com/forums/showcase/heroes-origins-sage-23-sonic-demo.1779/

Everything in the video is 100% in game engine footage, rendered in real time with sprites, using the Hazelnut Café Engine. Sonic Heroes Origins is a work in progress fangame demo being updated every day during SAGE Expo 2023.

Music: Awesome mashup by @NeonTwister used with permission.
Featuring:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dNCppUYxa6M
Funky Dealer (Jet Set Radio Future) Hideki Naganuma
Let it Go (Ollie King) Hideki Naganuma
Get Right (https://ashzonemusic.bandcamp.com)
Space Trip Steps (Meteor Herd) (Sonic Adventure 2) Tomoya Ohtani (Ashzone Remix)

Neon Twister: 
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/@NeonTwister
Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/neotwister
Bandcamp: https://neontwister.bandcamp.com

Programing and some custom sprites: Samuel Victor. Full credits for other custom sprites and assets used are on the SAGE Showcase booth, and in the game.

This is an unofficial fan game, created by Samuel Victor for SAGE 2023
Made for love, not profit! Strictly for free download only. Obviously all characters, logos, music etc belong to Sega. I'm eternally grateful that they are so cool about us making fan projects! :)
